text: Yoav Omer (; born in 1998) is an Israeli windsurfer. He won a silver medal at the 2018 european championships in Sopot. Omer is the 2015 and 2016 junior world champion. ==References== ==External links== *Profile at sailing.org Category:Living people Category:1998 births Category:Israeli windsurfers
title: Yoav Omer
